title: Ability to use CompressingStoredFieldsFormat
description: It would be nice to let Solr users use CompressingStoredFieldsFormat to compress their stored fields (with warnings given that this feature is experimental and that we don't guarantee backwards compat for it).

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: CompressingStoredFieldsFormat is now the default stored fields format, see LUCENE-4509.
